title: The Awakening of Housewives
overview: After the rich and beautiful Li Zhiqing marries self-made man Wang Yan, she becomes a full-time housewife, devoting herself to the family. However, it turns out that behind their seemingly happy marriage is the betrayal of her husband and best friend, who are cheating behind her back. When her father unexpectedly falls off a building, the company runs into trouble. Wang Yan, her once good husband, even shows his true colors, greedily competing with her to take control of the company. The awakened housewife fights back with all her might, showing no mercy in torturing the scumbag and seizing power, rewriting her life with great gusto.
